ETHPHY¶

Register Listing for ETHPHY¶

Register Address
ETHPHY_CRG_RESET 0x00001000
ETHPHY_RX_INBAND_STATUS 0x00001004
ETHPHY_MDIO_W 0x00001008
ETHPHY_MDIO_R 0x0000100c

ETHPHY_CRG_RESET¶

Address: 0x00001000 + 0x0 = 0x00001000

ETHPHY_RX_INBAND_STATUS¶

Address: 0x00001000 + 0x4 = 0x00001004

Field Name Description
[0] LINK_STATUS
Value Description
0b0 Link down.
0b1 Link up.
[1] CLOCK_SPEED
Value Description
0b00 2.5MHz (10Mbps).
0b01 25MHz (100MBps).
0b10 125MHz (1000MBps).
[2] DUPLEX_STATUS
Value Description
0b0 Half-duplex.
0b1 Full-duplex.

ETHPHY_MDIO_W¶

Address: 0x00001000 + 0x8 = 0x00001008

Field Name Description
     
     
     

ETHPHY_MDIO_R¶

Address: 0x00001000 + 0xc = 0x0000100c

Field Name Description
